pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========Logstash===========Logstash provides library for creating logstash messages from Python.The most useful class is the Event class that formats a JSON object intoa Python class. #!/usr/bin/env python import logstash event = logstash.Event(json_data) For more information on logstash goto the website `here <http://www.logstash.net/>`_
